channel.title: til osx hiden on
channel.description: Recent content in til osx hiden on

item.title: Show Hidden File
item.description: Tho show hidden file (file with x): Mojave: In finder CMD + Shift + . to toggle it Before Mojave: Show defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles YES; killall Finder /System/Library/CoreServices/Finder.app Hide defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles NO; killall Finder /System/Library/CoreServices/Finder.app
